definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: V. [[ערב]] (√ of foll.; cf. As. erêbu, enter, go in; erêb šamši, sunset; Ar. garaba set (distinct fr. garaba depart, = Sab. [[עַרב]] withdraw, acc. to DHM:Epigr. Denkm. 27), garbu place of sunset, west; Sab. [[מערבם]], [[מערבי]] [not [[עַ]] !] west, western, CIS:iv. p. 199 DHM:l. c.; Eth. 9arba: set (of heavenly bodies), so Syr. 9reb; 9ruwbto0 evening (Lag:BN 64 f.); Zinj. [[מערב]] west; NH [[עֶרֶב]] = BH. Hence also Eu)pw/ph, Europe, Lewy:Fremdw. 139).
